languages.text: "Допустим... допустим, Опустошительная буря не воюет с Черным сердцем, обнаружившим мой кабал здесь. Допустим, они объединились — по причине, которая пока от меня ускользает. Тогда все указывает на то, что мои соратники не гибли в боях — их забивали как скот, выведя на передовую". {n}Маражай кривится, оглядывая место событий.{/n}

"What if... what if the Reaving Tempest is not feuding with the Black Heart, which tracked my Kabal down here? What if they joined forces? For reasons that currently elude me. Then everything points to the fact that these warriors from my Kabal were not killed in a battle, but butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and grimaces.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Допустим... допустим, Опустошительная буря не воюет с Черным сердцем, обнаружившим мой кабал здесь. Допустим, они объединились — по причине, которая пока от меня ускользает. Тогда все указывает на то, что мои соратники не гибли в боях — их забивали как скот, выведя на передовую". {n}Маражай кривится, оглядывая место событий.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Assume the Reaving Tempest is not feuding with the Black Heart that discovered my Kabal here. Assume they joined forces for a reason that is eluding me yet. Then everything points to the fact that my compatriots were not killed in battle, they were butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and winces.{/n}

"Assume the Reaving Tempest is not feuding with the Black Heart that discovered my Kabal here. Assume they joined forces for a reason that is eluding me yet. Then everything points to the fact that my compatriots were not killed in battle, they were butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and winces.{/n}

Then everything points to the fact that these warriors from my Kabal were not killed in a battle, but butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and grimaces.{/n}

Then everything points to the fact that these warriors from my Kabal were not killed in a battle, but butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and grimaces.{/n}

"What if... what if the Reaving Tempest is not feuding with the Black Heart, which tracked my Kabal down here? What if they joined forces? For reasons that currently elude me. Then everything points to the fact that these warriors from my Kabal were not killed in a battle, but butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and grimaces.{/n}

languages.text: "Was, wenn ... was, wenn der Plündernde Sturm keine Fehde mit dem Schwarzen Herzen führt, das meine Kabale hierher verfolgt hat? Was, wenn sie sich zusammengeschlossen haben? Aus Gründen, die mir momentan nicht bekannt sind. Dann deutet alles darauf hin, dass diese Krieger meiner Kabale nicht im Kampf gefallen sind, sondern wie Vieh abgeschlachtet wurden, nachdem sie an die Front gebracht wurden." {n}Marazhai blickt sich um und verzieht das Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What if... what if the Reaving Tempest is not feuding with the Black Heart, which tracked my Kabal down here? What if they joined forces? For reasons that currently elude me. Then everything points to the fact that these warriors from my Kabal were not killed in a battle, but butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was, wenn ... was, wenn der Plündernde Sturm keine Fehde mit dem Schwarzen Herzen führt, das meine Kabale hierher verfolgt hat? Was, wenn sie sich zusammengeschlossen haben? Aus Gründen, die mir momentan nicht bekannt sind. Dann deutet alles darauf hin, dass diese Krieger meiner Kabale nicht im Kampf gefallen sind, sondern wie Vieh abgeschlachtet wurden, nachdem sie an die Front gebracht wurden." {n}Marazhai blickt sich um und verzieht das Gesicht.{/n}

languages.text: “如果……如果狂风阴谋团并没有遭到黑心阴谋团的追杀，也没有彼此争斗呢？如果他们实际上是一伙的呢？我不明白为什么会发生这种事情，但所有迹象都表明，这些阴谋团的战士并不是在战斗中丧命的，而是被带到前线之后，像牲畜一样遭到了宰杀。”{n}玛拉斋环顾四周，皱起眉头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What if... what if the Reaving Tempest is not feuding with the Black Heart, which tracked my Kabal down here? What if they joined forces? For reasons that currently elude me. Then everything points to the fact that these warriors from my Kabal were not killed in a battle, but butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果……如果狂风阴谋团并没有遭到黑心阴谋团的追杀，也没有彼此争斗呢？如果他们实际上是一伙的呢？我不明白为什么会发生这种事情，但所有迹象都表明，这些阴谋团的战士并不是在战斗中丧命的，而是被带到前线之后，像牲畜一样遭到了宰杀。”{n}玛拉斋环顾四周，皱起眉头。{/n}

languages.text: « Et si... et si la Tempête ravageuse avait fait la paix avec le Cœur Noir, qui a poursuivi ma Kabale jusqu'ici ? Et s'ils avaient même fait cause commune ? Pour des raisons qui m'échappent pour l'instant. Tout indique que ces guerriers de ma Kabale n'ont pas été tués dans une bataille, mais massacrés comme du bétail après avoir été amenés sur les lignes de front. » {n}Marazhai regarde autour de lui en grimaçant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What if... what if the Reaving Tempest is not feuding with the Black Heart, which tracked my Kabal down here? What if they joined forces? For reasons that currently elude me. Then everything points to the fact that these warriors from my Kabal were not killed in a battle, but butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et si... et si la Tempête ravageuse avait fait la paix avec le Cœur Noir, qui a poursuivi ma Kabale jusqu'ici ? Et s'ils avaient même fait cause commune ? Pour des raisons qui m'échappent pour l'instant. Tout indique que ces guerriers de ma Kabale n'ont pas été tués dans une bataille, mais massacrés comme du bétail après avoir été amenés sur les lignes de front. » {n}Marazhai regarde autour de lui en grimaçant.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Y si...? ¿Y si la Tempestad Asoladora no está luchado contra el Corazón Negro, que ha seguido a mi Kábala hasta aquí? ¿Y si han unido sus fuerzas por motivos que no alcanzo a comprender? En ese caso, todo indicaría que estos guerreros de mi Kábala no murieron en combate, sino que fueron masacrados como ganado tras ser traídos al frente». {n}Marazhai mira a su alrededor y se estremece.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What if... what if the Reaving Tempest is not feuding with the Black Heart, which tracked my Kabal down here? What if they joined forces? For reasons that currently elude me. Then everything points to the fact that these warriors from my Kabal were not killed in a battle, but butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Y si...? ¿Y si la Tempestad Asoladora no está luchado contra el Corazón Negro, que ha seguido a mi Kábala hasta aquí? ¿Y si han unido sus fuerzas por motivos que no alcanzo a comprender? En ese caso, todo indicaría que estos guerreros de mi Kábala no murieron en combate, sino que fueron masacrados como ganado tras ser traídos al frente». {n}Marazhai mira a su alrededor y se estremece.{/n}

languages.text: 「もし…もしもリーヴィング・テンペストが〈黒き心臓〉と争っていなかったら、どっちが俺の陰謀団をここで追いつめていただろう？もし奴らが勢力に加わっていたら？訳あって今は俺を避けている勢力だ。そうすれば全てのことはある事実を示すことになる。俺の陰謀団の戦士たちは戦いで殺されることはなかったが、前線に送り込まれた後に家畜のように虐殺されたという事実だ」{n}マラズハイは周りを見渡して顔をしかめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What if... what if the Reaving Tempest is not feuding with the Black Heart, which tracked my Kabal down here? What if they joined forces? For reasons that currently elude me. Then everything points to the fact that these warriors from my Kabal were not killed in a battle, but butchered like cattle after being brought to the front lines." {n}Marazhai looks around and grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もし…もしもリーヴィング・テンペストが〈黒き心臓〉と争っていなかったら、どっちが俺の陰謀団をここで追いつめていただろう？もし奴らが勢力に加わっていたら？訳あって今は俺を避けている勢力だ。そうすれば全てのことはある事実を示すことになる。俺の陰謀団の戦士たちは戦いで殺されることはなかったが、前線に送り込まれた後に家畜のように虐殺されたという事実だ」{n}マラズハイは周りを見渡して顔をしかめた。{/n}

languages.text: "Peki ya... Müfteris Kasırga, Kabalımın izini buraya kadar süren Kara Yürek ile çekişme içinde değilse? Ya güçlerini birleştirdilerse? Şu an bilemediğim sebeplerle. Öyle bir durumda her şey, Kabalımın savaşçılarının çatışmada ölmediklerine; buraya, ön cepheye getirildikten sonra kurbanlık hayvan gibi katledildiklerine işaret eder." {n}Marazhai etrafına bakıyor ve yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n}
